articles.description: A group of international flight attendants who recently flew to Sydney, Australia have been fined a total of A$13,000 after allegedly breaching a strict hotel quarantine in order to go shopping. The crew had arrived on a flight from South America on December …

articles.title: Pfizer COVID vaccine rollout begins in the United States, ICU nurse in New York one of the first to receive - 7NEWS.com.au
articles.description: The coronavirus has killed nearly 300,000 Americans. Now "the weapon that will end the war" is being rolled out, but salvation is a long way off.
articles.content:
With the prick of a needle, the battle against COVID-19 took what could be a decisive turn Monday as the first federally approved coronavirus vaccine was injected into an American arm.
